textContent:
I hope you come here every once in a while ðŸ«£ I mean I'd love when you'd want to feel close to me, it gets very hard at times to control the urge of being together physically but there are times when we grow emotionally distant, and that's when I want you to be here the most, to remind you that even when you feel so I'm (and I should be) the closest person in your life ðŸ˜­ 

Even when we get busy and aren't able to talk much, I want you to know that I'm here whenever you need me, all you need to do is be there, still!! And your suvi will give you all the love you deserve!
title: Open when you want to feel close to me.
textContentHtml:
I hope you come here every once in a while ðŸ«£ I mean I'd love when you'd want to feel close to me, it gets very hard at times to control the urge of being together physically but there are times when we grow emotionally distant, and that's when I want you to be here the most, to remind you that even when you feel so I'm (and I should be) the closest person in your life ðŸ˜­ 


Even when we get busy and aren't able to talk much, I want you to know that I'm here whenever you need me, all you need to do is be there, still!! And your suvi will give you all the love you deserve!
